title: Strategies to Improve Language Learning Engagement Using Online Video Lectures

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Project-based language learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, requiring instructional design to enhance engagement in video lectures.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze video lecture design elements (curriculum, time settings, netiquette, media utilization) and explain their impact on learning engagement and completion rates.
Learners can establish a video lecture utilization plan based on project themes and design learning strategies executable in smartphone environments.
Learners can evaluate and improve strategies to enhance video lecture participation based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
